let everyone know when you're available and when you're not.
sitting in front of my computer for too long
set a timer and take a break every 20 minutes.
use these time management steps -- Simplify, Prioritize, Delegate, Focus, and Say NO.
ask someone to be your accountability partner, make a contract and report on your progress to your partner.
feeling like part of the team
regular team meetings with video to see each other and an online forum for each team.
